summary: Represents a generic RTP feedback RTCP packet as defined in RFC 4585, encapsulating the fields needed to convey feedback information such as NACK, PLI, or FIR. It provides functionality to serialize the packet into its binary wire format and to construct an instance from raw data.
business_intent: Enable applications that handle real‑time media streams to generate, transmit, and interpret RTP feedback messages for congestion control, packet loss recovery, and quality monitoring.
